features: Find Your Color: Own your space with a cordless mouse that matches your aesthetic, whether you go fresh and vibrant or keep it minimalist
Modern, Slim, Beautiful Pebble Shape: Logitech Pebble slim mouse has standout simplicity with a design that is nice to hold, feels great in your hand and is easy to carry around
Quiet Click Mouse with Ultra-Quiet Scrolling: Enjoy an ultra-quiet experience with over 90% noise reduction(1) on the click sound-even the wide rubber scroll wheel glides in silence
Dual Connectivity: Connect the way you like via Bluetooth wireless technology or the included tiny USB receiver
Long Battery Life: Logitech Pebble Mouse stays powered for up to 18 months on a single AA battery (battery life may vary based on your use)
High-Precision Optical Tracking: Logitech Pebble tracks fast and accurately where you want to use it
Versatile: Compatible with iPad OS(2) via Bluetooth, Windows, macOS, Linux, ChromeOS, iPadOS, and Android operating systems; it is also a Works with Chromebook certified product
body.description: Own your space with Logitech Portable Wireless Mouse M350 – a modern, slim, and silent portable mouse designed for your curated lifestyle. Make a statement with this slim mouse that can easily be scooped up and brought to the cafe or library. Silent clicking and scrolling means you can stay focused without disturbing those around you. And the Portable Wireless Mouse M350 stays powered for 18-months on a single AA battery so you don’t have to worry about losing power. Connect the Portable Mouse M350 the way you want – via either Bluetooth or the USB receiver. The high-precision optical tracking works on most surfaces. Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Modern, Slim And Beautiful Logitech Pebble M350’s minimalist design fits your curated lifestyle and accents your desk setup. Organic Shape, Natural Fit Logitech Pebble M350 has been designed to be extra slim while still fitting naturally in the palm of your hand. The soft rounded sides are so comfortable, you’ll never want to let it go. Ultra Portable The slim design can be easily tossed in your laptop bag and brought to the coffee shop for on-the-go productivity. The Right Color For You Choose Logitech Pebble M350 in rose or blue grey to match the rest of your accessories or bring a touch of color to your desk setup.

Click And Scroll In Silence Work in an open office, a library, or even a crowded train without disturbing anyone around you. You’ll get the same click and scroll wheel feel you love, but make about 90% less noise. Connect The Way You Like Connect simply with Bluetooth or the 2.4 GHz USB receiver—stored in the magnetic cover of the mouse—and never worry about annoying drop-offs or lag up to a 10m range. Work Wherever Life Takes You Get precise cursor control. Logitech Pebble M350 tracks fast and accurately where you want to use it. Go Longer Between Batteries 18-month battery life means you don’t have to worry about losing power. Logitech Pebble M350 automatically goes into battery-saving sleep mode when you’re taking a break.

MK470 Slim Wireless Combo Ultra-thin and design-forward keyboard and mouse combo perfect for getting things done efficiently and quietly – even in the tightest desk spaces. LEARN MORE K380 Multi-Device Bluetooth Keyboard Versatile keyboard that seamlessly connects to your laptop, tablet and phone. Ideal for multitasking. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Mouse For Travel
reviews.reviewText: This super sleek and stylish mouse would not replace my static workstation mouse but is absolutely perfect for travel.The Pebble's modern and crazy slim design is a visual delight, with a pebble-shaped body that feels comfortable and surprisingly natural in your hand. It's the perfect companion for those on the go, thanks to its compact size and easy portability.One standout feature of this mouse is its quiet clicks. With over 90% noise reduction, you can enjoy a peaceful working environment without disturbing others. Even the wide rubber scroll wheel glides in silence, providing a truly serene scrolling experience.Connectivity options are abundant with the Logitech Pebble. You can choose between Bluetooth wireless technology or the included tiny USB receiver, allowing you to connect the way you prefer. Plus, the mouse boasts a long battery life, lasting up to 18 months on a single AA battery.When it comes to precision, the Logitech Pebble delivers. Its high-precision optical tracking ensures accurate cursor control and responsiveness wherever you need it.The Pebble Wireless Mouse combines style, functionality, and convenience seamlessly. Its slim and beautiful design, quiet clicks, dual connectivity options, and long battery life make it a standout choice for any traveler. 🖱️✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Love this mouse. It’s design is sleek and it’s durable. It’s not noisy like your normal mouse is. This one is totally quiet!! The cursor response is lightning-fast and it offers smooth and precise tracking. The mouse fits nicely in the palm of my hand making handling very easy. Logi doesn’t disappoint with this mouse. With a wide array of colors it is aesthetically appealing. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, Silent, and Superb: Logitech Pebble Wireless Mouse
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Logitech Pebble Wireless Mouse, and it has quickly become an indispensable part of my daily tech setup. This mouse, with its sleek design and versatile connectivity options, offers a seamless and enjoyable user experience that stands out from the crowd.Firstly, the design of the Logitech Pebble is worth applauding. Its minimalist, pebble-like shape not only gives it a modern aesthetic but also makes it incredibly comfortable to hold for extended periods. Whether I'm working on a lengthy report or indulging in a casual browsing session, the ergonomic design ensures that my hand never feels fatigued.One of the most striking features of this mouse is its near-silent clicking and scrolling. It's so quiet that I can work in the dead of night without disturbing anyone around me. This feature is a godsend, especially in shared spaces like libraries or during late-night collaborative sessions.The versatility in connectivity is another area where the Logitech Pebble shines. It offers the convenience of connecting via Bluetooth or a 2.4 GHz receiver, ensuring compatibility with virtually any setup. I've seamlessly switched between devices and operating systems without any hiccups, thanks to this dual connectivity feature.The performance of the Logitech Pebble is as smooth as its design. The tracking is precise, and it responds instantly to even the slightest movements. Whether I'm navigating through complex spreadsheets or engaging in graphic design work, the accuracy and responsiveness of this mouse make every task more enjoyable.Battery life is often a concern with wireless devices, but the Logitech Pebble has put all my worries to rest. It's incredibly energy-efficient, and I've yet to face any issues with the battery draining unexpectedly. This reliability gives me peace of mind, especially during critical work sessions or while traveling.In conclusion, the Logitech Pebble Wireless Mouse is a blend of style, comfort, and functionality. Its silent operation, versatile connectivity, ergonomic design, and reliable performance make it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their daily computer interactions. It's not just a mouse; it's a statement of efficiency and elegance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mouse; Bluetooth is unreliable on Windows -- not a fault of the mouse
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking, feels good, and it works well. The buttons and scroll wheel are good; the cursor speed is good. Recommended, but there is a small problem, which I believe is not the fault of the mouse.Unfortunately, after a week it lost the Bluetooth connection and would not reconnect until I turned off wi-fi. Then it stayed connected after I turned wi-fi again -- until the next time. This is a known problem with Windows, not the mouse as far as I can tell.Wi-fi, Bluetooth, and I believe Thunderbolt all use the same frequency band. The devices are supposed to negotiate to avoid this conflict, but it doesn't work well on Windows. In the past, I have had a Bluetooth mouse completely and repeatedly fail on Windows 10 with wi-fi, but work perfectly without any problem with Linux running on the same computer. There are also lots of reports of the same problem with other brands of Bluetooth mouse. This time I am running Windows 11. I blame Windows, not the mouse. How much problem you will have is probably unpredictable.My previous Logitech mouse worked beautifully and reliably through years of abuse. It has been dropped many times, without any apparent damage. It did finally fail to turn on, which is why I bought this mouse.

Super silencioso, leve e ergonômico. O design é muito bonito. É ótimo para quem não tem muitas entradas USB, por ter opção bluetooth. Vale muito a pena. Ótimo vendedor, caprichoso com a embalagem, bem lacrado e produto 100% original. Super indico.

Esta perfecto, me gusto mucho el color, es bastante cómodo y agradable al tacto. lo mejor es que no hace nada de ruido al clickear, totalmente silencioso y discreto. Se puede transportar fácilmente incluso en el bolsillo del pantalón.

Llevo usándolo casi 5 meses. Al ser bastante plano, se acomoda para transportarlo. Además tiene el compartimiento para colocar el toggle en él. En cuanto a ergonomía, lo usé junto con un pad con almohadilla y ha sido muy cómodo, aunque presiento que sin el pad se empeoraría un poco el uso porque por el tamaño no se puede descansar la mano sobre el mouse.Los clics realmente son silenciosos, ideal para usarlo en clases presenciales y no hacer mucho ruido. En cuanto a la rueda, su sonido es más parecido al de mouses regulares, aunque su clic sí es más silencioso.Lo he probado tanto con el toggle como con Bluetooth y no he tenido problemas, al igual que en Windows y Android y funciona perfectamente.Buen mouse, aunque en ocasiones se llega a encontrar por un precio elevado y es ahí donde no creo que valga tanto la pena, pero por menos de 300mxn lo encuentro como excelente opción :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'd taken my Mac from home as was working away, but left my keyboard and mouse at home. Had to purchase urgently. I didn't really want to spend out on Apple's own make as my own is only 2 years old.Read the reviews and bought this. Absolutely love it, so much so that I'm using it all the time instead of my Apple mouse. Don't hesitate, this is a solid comfortable, and well-made mouse. I love having the wheel to scroll too. Very responsive.
